amendment.description: To establish a fact-finding Commission to extend the study of a prior Commission to investigate and determine facts and circumstances surrounding the relocation, internment, and deportation to Axis countries of Latin Americans of Japanese descent from December 1941 through February 1948, and the impact of those actions by the United States, and to recommend appropriate remedies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3214 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3214 proposed by Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S12709-12710; text: CR S12709-12710) To establish a fact-finding Commission to extend the study of a prior Commission to investigate and determine facts and circumstances surrounding the relocation, internment, and deportation to Axis countries of Latin Americans of Japanese descent from December 1941 through February 1948, and the impact of those actions by the United States, and to recommend appropriate remedies, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3214 proposed by Senator Inouye.
